name: Mono Laboratories The Game
description:
A Horror Story Game with Puzzles and a Bunch of different enemies and friends to find. 

You play as 23 year old Tim Smith trying to find out what caused his wife Sarah Smith to die and now all arrows are pointing towards the destroyed Factory called Mono Laboratories. Will he find out what happened the night of the crash? lets see!

Demo Out Now!

full game coming out in 202_
